info.title: Tedee Local API
info.description:
Login Page
API Documentation This is tedee update api documentation

get.summary: Get signed time.

post.summary: Bulk insert activity logs to server.
post.description:
The request accept base64 string with activities and signature of activities. The data should be sent in TLV format.Parameters:
  • DeviceId - Log was created on device with this Id,
  • Event - Id of event,
  • Source: 0 - Device, 1 - Mobile,
  • Date - long int which presents milliseconds from 01.01.1970.

post.summary: Bulk insert activity logs to server.
post.description:
Parameters:
  • DeviceId - Log was created on device with this Id,
  • Event - Id of event,
  • Source: 0 - Device, 1 - Mobile,
  • Date - long int which presents milliseconds from 01.01.1970.

get.summary: Show all device activities ordered by date paged.
get.description:
Device activity logs are ordered by date.

Parameters:

  • (int) deviceId,
  • (int) elements - number of elements to load (max 200),
  • (nullable DateTime) lastElemDate - Date in UTC. When is set, showed are elements with date older than entered date. If null, date is set to current UTC time. Example: "2018-09-06T15:00:00.000"

Parameters:

  • OperatingSystem: 0 - iOS, 1 - Android, 3 - Other
  • PublicKey

Get activities for organization device or user.
get.description:
Parameters:
  • DeviceId - lock ID (integer)
  • UserId - user ID (integer)
  • Filters.LockName - lock name, filter works as contains
  • Filters.UserOrPin - user organization display name, user email, or PIN name
  • Filters.StartDate - after that date the activities will be returned
  • Filters.EndDate - before that date activities will be returned
  • Filters.Type - possible lock states. States are: 0 -> Unlocked; 1 -> Locked; 2 -> Pulled; 3 -> Semi-locked

get.description: 409 response code indicates that software on the device does not match the one on the server. In such a case, a call to 'softwareupdate/confirmupdate' endpoint is required to update software version.

post.description: This will save on the server the current software version that's on the device.

BearerOrPersonalKey.description:
Authorization header using the JWT token/PAK scheme.

JWT Bearer example: Authorization: Bearer {jwtTokenValue}
PersonalKey (PAK) example : Authorization: PersonalKey {personalKeyValue}
BearerOrPersonalKey.name: Authorization
